short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Basic TODO extension to keep track of you daily tasks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Basic TODO extension to keep track of you daily tasks.
Functionalities:
1.All your todo tasks are stored in chrome local storage.
2.Even if you accidentally refresh the browser or quit the chrome window, your data is saved automatically.
3.This has some cool CSS animations applied.
4.You can mark the task as completed or you can delete as well.

Future plans:
1. Add timer to each task based on user config.
2. Context menu functionality
